name: A Zombie Tail (itch)
description:
A game that was created by my partner and I as well as music done by a friend. The game was started before our son was born and finished before our daughter was born. This game is dedicated to both of them.

Are you ready to save your best friend from the zombie invasion?

Defeat waves of zombies in this defense style game. Armed with a bone and several power ups, keep the zombies at bay as you battle across several levels by timing and managing your attacks across 4 lanes.


- Play through stages plus an unforgiving boss stage.

- Unlock other levels of difficulty to test your zombie killing strategies.

- Endless level mode

- Unlock  Achievements 

- unlock the hidden secrets..

- Free updates and fixes

- You pay for a full game and get a full game with no ads or in app purchases

- Plus much more!
